column5: They may very well be. It follows me everywhere.
I didn't give anyone up. They betrayed ME. They raised me in a lie man. But you are right I did suspect bring watched by the MI5 and CIA.
They don't want you to know...
No, as a matter of fact just happened last week...
Induced by human? What do you mean?
I read it too quickly....
You're welcome bro
If beer is flat is it schizoid?
Good luck
I'm sorry I touched you
Fuck off perp
She hasn't cheated you say...? That you know of...

Definitely. In my earlier years when I didn't appreciate how people saw us... Many small things but the people noticed it... My uncle has back problems and he drops the key on the floor and I just sat there staring at him. One occurrence was especially revealing when I was on the phone with a handicapped friend of my father's. He tells me he's doing surgery and will have to use a wheelchair for some time. I literally just respond with "goodbye" to the horror and shock of both my father and his friend.
Americans are very dangerous. Look at Ted Bundy!
ENTJ through and through
Different could be many things you know... But if you specifically relate to ASPD then that says something.

Nope. I m set to go for therapy and asked to test for aspd and NPD. Will see what happens.

Frankly, I don't want to jump the gun and assume I am something I am not like some edgy teenager... But the signs are glaring! Animal torture in childhood comes to mind. Laughing at people in pain and abusing other kids... Later delinquency at the age of 17 (theft).

Sounds like you copied me...

Feels strange to read this

Yeah I don't lurk here too often...

I've seen some retarded shit spouted by so called TIs and I mentioned this on my youtube channel. Some of these people are posers and clowns. Others have been so far driven they believe in voodoo shit and all sorts of madness. I guess it comes with the turf! But yeah I take stuff with a pinch of salt...
I meant coerced. But I was forced initially mind you. It was only when I left the psych ward that I could stop
It means you 're good looking
I'm ENTJ that's probably why
I don't hear voices
Lol I already did and I feel like a million bucks. No one should be forced to take meds they don't need...
Word
Um. Can you specify why you think I'm a perp?
Who me? I'm a target just like you
Excuse me?
I have a job. Gotta persevere bro
Aha
Get a job?

I was falsely forced into a psych ward after my initial gangstalking with the aim to institutionalize me for life. I panicked, became agitated and aggressive which was used against me. 

I know that I am not crazy and that what is happening to me is real. Which is why I stopped the psych meds and have improved a lot ever since.
I ended up in the psych ward and I stopped now that I'm out. No one can force me.
What if you stop taking them?
Stop thinking about men and look at the girl in front of you
Dude my brain recovered, no joke! I speak so fast
Fair enough

I went to Scotland once and after partying in a club, a girl came up to me and said "I want to give you a blow job".

My point was about women you go out on a date with.
You're delusional. I'm an Adonis hehe
Knock em out cold
Psychiatry is bogus

Why was he diagnosed with ASPD before the age of 18????????

Also, petty theft does not constitute an ASPD diagnosis. You need to show that you consistently commit criminal acts.

Thirdly, risperidone is an antipsychotic so why would that be prescribed for a personality disorder?
Why not
Joking it's what Ted Bundy did. I have a weird fascination with the guy
I usually wait outside my neighbors window and Jack off to her getting undressed
Where do you get this drug?

Benxos are addicted so it's good you stopped them. Good luck to you.

Dude anything can be healed by quoting carbs and sugar, not just cardiovascular but also cancer an diabetes.

This is the truth that no fucking asshole doctor will admit. They can all suck my dick cause I'm smarter than them.

Fantasies? Tell that to the people who stalked me for years and even blatantly called out my name saying how they wanted "payback". You're ignorant as fuck if you think this shit never happens.

Also, you are retarded if you think just because something never happened to you or that you didn't see evidence for proves it doesn't exist. Logic dictates that something could happen even if there is no evidence left behind for it. If you're too thick to understand good the perfect crime, that'll get your brain working.
Fair enough
Will do
Fuck this shit
Medication only did harm to my mental faculties so it's funny that you would recommend me to take them. I am doing very well without them and I intend on keeping it that way.
How would you know? Go back to sleep
You said it, loss of motivation, apathy and potentially depression
How retarded are you?
Hmmm
Jump off a cliff ya cunt
It was beef and I cooked it in chopped tomato with garlic, spices, olive oil and butter.
Just had brain yesterday. It was good
I lift heavy weights at least 3-4 times a week and I eat twice a day. I guess I'm on the right path.
Possibly. But then again so could the average person
You 're an idiot for even caring. There is no morality it's made up. Protect yourself. End of story.
It's worth the risk

It's a lot more than that. Not only ASPD don't need validation but they are also more aggressive and antisocial than NPD. Narcissism is still a social disorder meaning it functions within the bounds of what is socially acceptable. NPD may be prone to using social aggression but not actual aggression while ASPD may go as far as committing criminal acts.
You learned your lesson
So random. You're weird. But cool. We should hang out
Most of them I get. So what? You want to kill me? I'm not dead!!!
I'm trolling
Damn
Yeah suck my dick bitch. No scram

Dude, I'm a foreigner and having lived here for 8 years I can safely tell you these people are fucking pussies man. It's all about political correctness and conflict avoidance here. No one wants to ruffle any feathers so to speak.

I mean lots of young girls were being groomed by some gangs and they did nothing about it for years.
Yeah when I did the interview for this current job I have the manager started laughing and said "do you need psychiatric care?". It creates problems finding jobs.
UK to be honest. That's one of the reasons I went back. Germany and Netherlands was pretty bad. Sweden was the worst.
Seconded
I'm not depressed. I was asking why people on here call depressed people faggots.

Will do.

To be honest I do feel like women are luckier than men and have it easier. But I would never have it any other way that's for sure.
How can a man hate his own masculinity?
I am not depressed but thank you for your answer.
I am not depressed, I was just asking because I saw some people saying it on here. What you said is reasonable.

There is truth to the blackpill. Looks do matter, a lot.

I'll give you an example, during my BP days when I wasn't lifting and knew nothing about women I got randomly approached. Now I wasn't muscular but I've always been fairly handsome. This girl once approached me and offered me a blowjob. Mind you, I didn't know her and never spoke to her. So the only thing with which she made that decision was based on my good looks. I generally get very favourable treatment by women and it definitely has to do with good looks.

Again, this is not to say that your attitude and lifting have no impact. But if you are particularly short and unattractive you do stand at a disadvantage.
You 're tripping dude. Come back to reality. Gangstalking is a program meant to kill You
Exactly

Yeah it sounds like gangstalking. You can be targeted even if you are schizophrenic. It's not beyond the realm of possibility. 

I am actually surprised they physically touched you. They usually don't have the courage to do that.
Well there definitely was a reason in my case. I blew up in anger and shouted some angry stuff. They think I'm a terrorist basically.
Whatever you believe
Massive increases. At least 100 ng/dl increase
Exactly.

When my gangstalking began it created lots of stress, yes. It's all linked.

Yeah look I'm not saying your friend wasn't gangstalked but he clearly suffers from mental issues as well. Don't underestimate the huge mental damage gangstalking can cause to an individual. It's very traumatic.

But in my case I don't hear voices or think the television is talking about me. All I encounter is people harassing me in public.
Yes

There were so many events that happened in succession and repetitively. Yeah, I have no doubts!

These specific kids may not have mentioned my name but others have in different gangstalking events. They don't always mention my name but I can hear them talking about me. They will mention private things in my life. They have done this to me so many times it's ridiculous.
The mentions they made were very clear. You would only understand if you experienced it

Your friend sounds mentally ill with all due respect. Ideas of references from movies and television is a hallmark of schizophrenia and other psychotic disorders.

I am not talking about television. I am talking about actual people I can see and hear and oftentimes interact with. They make it very fucking clear they are messing with me.

Early 20s.

It was a street theatre and they were making fun of something that happened to me 3 years ago. They also kept calling me a faggot which is used extensively in my targeting.
By kids I mean they were in their 20s
Yeah I used to react but now I don't bother. Thanks for the advice.

I told them exactly what I thought they were doing which is talking about me. I asked how they knew who I was. Sometimes I would aggressively tell them to back off.

Once 2 kids started doing street theatre below my flat and I shouted at them. I told them to wait for me and went down to hit them. They ran away immediately.

Confronted, yes. Many times and I was met with denial.

Recording is difficult because you never know when it will happen. Also my phone at the time didn't record audio very well.
Street theatre, talking about my private life, mocking me, insulting me, coughing at me, let me know I am watched, threatening me with gestures, shouting...etc
Not everyone who claims to be a TI is really a TI. Some are mentally ill but then it could also be that mentally ill get targeted on top of their illness.

This might sound funny but bear with me. Humans need to be fighting for survival to feel that they are alive. That's why the happiest people in the world are Isis fighters because they are out there putting their lives at risk everyday. Life in the sheltered first world is just boring and mundane. Not promoting terrorism btw
